attributes.action: Allow civil wedding ceremonies to be undertaken in the open air, or anywhere the participants want
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Great Britain has some beautiful places, which is understating the fantastic beauty of this wonderful land of ours. 
There should be nothing wrong in just hiring a registrar and getting married in any public place the couple wishes, and it be legally binding. There are some spectacular places where marriages, and indeed, other civil ceremonies, could be performed. All the participants would need is imagination!
